body: I was hoping for a philosophical treatise about the nature of self-delusion, the origin of superstitious fairy tales, why moral panics and self-proclaimed messiahs and their cults of personality are so popular, and why history repeats itself...  First as tragedy, then as farce. Still, I wasn't that disappointed.
Why is there a mother tag? she's obviously a sister.
Fav bc she got a wagon
What is with this cultist type shit, oml.
